recommendations.title: Build Emergency Foundation Before Credit Card Attack
recommendations.description: Establish a starter emergency fund to prevent new debt during unexpected expenses, and then tackle the high-priority HDFC Credit Card.

recommendations.title: High-Priority Credit Card: Debt Snowball Attack
recommendations.description: Focus on paying off the HDFC Credit Card with the smallest balance first, using the 'debt snowball' method to build momentum and motivation.

recommendations.title: Personal Loan: Debt Snowball Attack
recommendations.description: Focus on paying off the Personal Loan - Wedding with the smallest balance first, using the 'debt snowball' method to build momentum and motivation.
